Things That Go Bump in The Night III

28 Feb 2018

I did it! I watched all the way through It. Yes, the film was certainly scary in parts but, despite my nervous disposition, it wasn't the most terrifying thing in the world. It was also a great movie and I would strongly recommend it, but mostly I am proud of myself for conquering my fears and actually seeing it.
